summary.span: 获取或设置文件对话框的自定义空间的列表。

span.span: Gets or sets the list of custom places for file dialog boxes.

value.span: 自定义空间的列表。

span.span: The list of custom places.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从开始 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winvista](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winvista-md.md)] ，"打开和保存文件" 对话框的左侧有一个 " **收藏夹链接** " 面板，使用户能够快速导航到不同的位置。Starting in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winvista](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winvista-md.md)], open and save file dialog boxes have a **Favorite Links** panel on the left side of the dialog box that allows the user to quickly navigate to a different location. 这些链接称为自定义位置。These links are called custom places. 此属性允许您修改应用程序使用文件对话框时显示的列表。This property allows you to modify the list that appears when your application uses a file dialog box.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultExt { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DefaultExt : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定用来筛选显示的文件列表的默认扩展名字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the default extension string to use to filter the list of files that are displayed.

value.span: 默认扩展名字符串。

span.span: The default extension string.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展字符串必须包含前导句点。The extension string must contain the leading period. 例如，将属性设置 为 ".txt" 以选择所有文本文件。For example, set the property to ".txt" to select all text files. 默认情况下， 属性将尝试确定用于从属性筛选显示的文件列表的扩展 。By default, the property attempts to determine the extension to filter the displayed file list from the property. 如果无法通过属性确定扩展 ， 则改用。If the extension cannot be determined from the property, will be used instead. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 包含默认文件名和扩展类型的。The following example shows how to create an that contains a default file name and extension type. [!code-csharp[DialogBoxesOverviewSnippets#OpenFileDialogBoxCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DialogBoxesOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#openfiledialogboxcodebehind)] [!code-vb[DialogBoxesOverviewSnippets#OpenFileDialogBoxCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DialogBoxesOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/window1.xaml.vb#openfiledialogboxcodebehind)]

span.span: to return the location referenced; to return the shortcut location.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event FileOk As CancelEventHandler

summary.span: 当用户通过单击 的“打开”按钮或 的“保存”按钮选择某个文件名时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user selects a file name by either clicking the **Open** button of the or the **Save** button of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户选择文件名之后、对话框关闭之前，将引发，这允许您处理选定内容。 is raised after the user selects a file name, but before the dialog closes, which allows you to process the selection. 如果需要，可以通过将 参数的属性设置为来取消用户的选择 `true` 。If required, the user's selection can be cancelled by setting the property of the argument to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Filter : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置筛选器字符串，该字符串确定在 或 中显示的文件类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the filter string that determines what types of files are displayed from either the or .

value.span: 一个包含筛选器的 。

span.span: A that contains the filter.

value.span: 默认值为 ，这意味着，不应用任何筛选器并显示所有文件类型。

span.span: The default is , which means that no filter is applied and all file types are displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为 `null` 或 ，则显示所有文件，并且始终显示文件夹。If is either `null` or , all files are displayed, and folders are always displayed. 您可以通过设置属性来指定要显示的文件类型的子集 。You can specify a subset of file types to be displayed by setting the property. 每个文件类型可以表示特定类型的文件，如下所示：Each file type can represent a specific type of file, such as the following: - Word 文档 ( \* .doc) Word Documents (\*.doc) - Excel 工作表 ( \* .xls) Excel Worksheets (\*.xls) - PowerPoint 演示文稿 ( \* .ppt) PowerPoint Presentations (\*.ppt) 或者，文件类型可以表示一组相关的文件类型，如下所示：Alternatively, a file type can represent a group of related file types, such as the following: - Office 文件 ( \* .doc，\* .xls，\* .ppt) Office Files (\*.doc, \*.xls, \*.ppt) - 所有文件 ( \*。 \*) All Files (\*.\*) 若要指定显示的文件类型的子集，请 使用 (*筛选器字符串*) 指定一个或多个要筛选的文件类型的字符串值来设置属性。To specify a subset of the types of files that are displayed, you set the property with a string value (the *filter string*) that specifies one or more types of files to filter by. 下面显示了所需的筛选器字符串格式：The following shows the expected format of the filter string: `FileType1[[|FileType2]...[|FileTypeN]]` 使用以下格式描述每种文件类型：You use the following format to describe each file type: `Label|Extension1[[;Extension2]...[;ExtensionN]]` *标签* 部分是可读的字符串值，用于描述文件类型，如下所示：The *Label* part is a human-readable string value that describes the file type, such as the following: - "Word 文档""Word Documents" - "Excel 工作表""Excel Worksheets" - "PowerPoint 演示文稿""PowerPoint Presentations" - "Office 文件""Office Files" - "所有文件""All Files" 每个文件类型都必须至少由一个 *扩展* 进行描述。Each file type must be described by at least one *Extension*. 如果使用多个 *扩展名* ，则每个 *扩展* 必须由分号分隔 ( ";") 。If more than one *Extension* is used, each *Extension* must be separated by a semicolon (";"). 例如：For example: - "\* .doc""\*.doc" - "\* .xls;""\*.xls;" - "\* .ppt""\*.ppt" - "\* .doc; \* 。xls; \* 。ppt"\*.doc;\*.xls;\*.ppt" - "\*.\*""\*.\*" 下面是有效字符串值的完整示例 ：The following are complete examples of valid string values: - `Word Documents|*.doc` - `Excel Worksheets|*.xls` - `PowerPoint Presentations|*.ppt` - `Office Files|*.doc;*.xls;*.ppt` - `All Files|*.*` - `Word Documents|*.doc|Excel Worksheets|*.xls|PowerPoint Presentations|*.ppt|Office Files|*.doc;*.xls;*.ppt|All Files|*.*` 筛选器中包含的每个文件类型都作为单独的项添加到或的 " **类型：** " 下拉列表中 ，如下图所示。Each file type that is included in the filter is added as a separate item to the **Files of type:** drop-down list in the or , as shown in the following figure. ![在“打开”对话框中使用 FileDialog.Filter](~/add/media/filedialogfilterfigure1.png "在“打开”对话框中使用 FileDialog.Filter")![Using the FileDialog.Filter in the Open Dialog Box](~/add/media/filedialogfilterfigure1.png "Using the FileDialog.Filter in the Open Dialog Box") 用户可以从该列表中选择要按其进行筛选的文件类型。The user can choose a file type from this list to filter by. 默认情况下，列表中的第一项 (例如，当显示或时，将选择第一个文件类型) 。By default, the first item in the list (for example, the first file type) is selected when the or is displayed. 若要指定要选择的另一种文件类型，请在 显示 或 (之前 通过调用) 来设置属性 。To specify that another file type to be selected, you set the property before showing the or (by calling ). ## Examples 下面的示例演示了几种类型的筛选器字符串，可以通过使用 属性进行设置。The following examples demonstrate several types of filter strings that can be set by using the property. [!code-csharp[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#filterstring1)] [!code-vb[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#filterstring1)] [!code-csharp[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#filterstring2)] [!code-csharp[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#filterstring7)] [!code-vb[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#filterstring7)] [!code-csharp[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#filterstring8)] [!code-vb[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#filterstring8)]

summary.span: 获取或设置文件对话框中当前选定的筛选器的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the filter currently selected in a file dialog.

value.span: 一个 ，表示选定的筛选器的索引。

span.span: The that is the index of the selected filter.

value.span: 默认值为 1。

span.span: The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此索引是从1开始的，而不是从0开始的，因为基础 API 的兼容性要求 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] 。This index is 1-based, not 0-based, due to compatibility requirements with the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] API.

summary.span: 获取 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] 通用文件对话框标志，文件对话框使用这些标志来进行初始化。

span.span: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] common file dialog flags that are used by file dialogs for initialization.

value.span: 一个包含 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] 通用文件对话框标志的 ，文件对话框使用这些标志来进行初始化。

span.span: A that contains the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] common file dialog flags that are used by file dialogs for initialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值用于显示文件对话框，其中包含当前的一组属性值。This value is used to display a file dialog with the current set of property values. 实际选项在特定对话框上公开为属性，但在此级别上并未记录为公共标志值，因此，此属性的使用主要是内部的，以便在实现派生类和时 使用 。The actual options are exposed as properties on the specific dialogs, but not documented as public flag values at this level, so the uses of this property are mainly internal, for use when implementing the derived classes and .

value.span: 默认值为 ，当未选定文件或选定目录时也为此值。

span.span: The default is , which is also the value when either no file is selected or a directory is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值为 移除了所有路径信息的。This value is the with all path information removed. 删除路径将使值适合在部分信任的应用程序中使用，因为它会阻止应用程序发现有关本地文件系统的信息。Removing the paths makes the value appropriate for use in partial trust applications, since it prevents applications from discovering information about the local file system. 如果选择了多个文件名 (长度 为大于一) ，则此属性仅包含第一个选定的文件名。If more than one file name is selected (length of is greater than one) then this property contains only the first selected file name. 请参阅 [从 XBAP 示例安全文件上传](/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/aa358504(v=vs.90))。See [Safe File Upload from an XBAP Sample](/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/aa358504(v=vs.90)).
